title: Snowdown Mission Emote Not Received After Missions?
body: Is there a time frame before we get rewarded with the themed gingerbread emotes? I completed my missions a few days ago, and I haven't received the emote.

replies.body:
Hey Triangle Man, 

Just wanted to follow up - did you get your emote?

Nope. I completed the Nice missions and was hoping that the emote was delayed, but now it's after Snowdown and it hasn't arrived. I'm not sure if you can check which missions I've completed, but [here's a picture of my emote collection.](https://imgur.com/a/XjjcZ)

Oh crap. Hmm, okay. I personally don't have access to accounts, but our Player Support team does! If you shoot 'em a [message](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'll be able to see details and help you from there. :)

Um, it seems I hadn't checked my account when I quickly snipped a picture of my collection. I seem to have received my Braumbread emote sometime between when I made this thread and when I snapped that screencap. Thanks very much for your help! I lay all the credit for my late Braumbread emote's appearance at your feet.
Is your name a reference to They Might Be Giants?
